mobileIdleFormFooter.send:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text for sending content in an idle mobile editor
**UI Location**: Markdown editor form footer (mobile, idle state)
**When Users See This**: When the markdown editor is in an idle state on a mobile device
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a disabled send button
**Current English**: "Send"
newFormFooter.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to cancel creating new content
**UI Location**: Markdown editor form footer (new content, empty value)
**When Users See This**: When starting to create new content and the input is empty, allowing the user to cancel
**Technical Context**: Appears as a 'cancel' button; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Cancel"
newFormFooter.send:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to submit new content
**UI Location**: Markdown editor form footer (new content, value present)
**When Users See This**: When creating new content and the input has content to be sent
**Technical Context**: Appears on a primary submit button; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Send"
editFormFooter.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to cancel editing content
**UI Location**: Markdown editor form footer (edit mode)
**When Users See This**: When editing existing content and choosing to discard changes
**Technical Context**: Appears on a default button; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Cancel"
editFormFooter.delete:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to delete existing content
**UI Location**: Markdown editor form footer (edit mode, empty value)
**When Users See This**: When editing content, if the input is empty, suggesting deletion of the existing item
**Technical Context**: Appears on an alert-style button; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Delete"
editFormFooter.update:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to submit updated content
**UI Location**: Markdown editor form footer (edit mode, value present)
**When Users See This**: When editing existing content and the input has content to be updated
**Technical Context**: Appears on a primary submit button; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Update"
